body_html: yes, it does not make sense to require gradients for this LongTensor but I think that the previous version of pytorch still didn't end up in a RuntimeError (throwing this error is probably better).

body: yes, it does not make sense to require gradients for this LongTensor but I think that the previous version of pytorch still didn't end up in a RuntimeError (throwing this error is probably better).
